_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_FISHHOOK


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: March 17 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for very old and long ago known map [de_fishhook](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/8716) by white_pony (released April 2005). It's a completely hand-made and carefully optimized .nav-file (because in original author's release the .nav-file probably was simple auto-gen embedded in .bsp-file).

This Navigation Mesh was remade approximately for 70% and the most part of the areas was recustomized manually 'cause auto-generated Navigation Mesh was not fully playable. The special attention was paid to pathways through a tunnels and the second level of buildings. Also a pathway through the underground tunnel was builded from scratch.

Well... bots freely move through all possible ways now. They with pleasure will organize to you cheerful fishing! ;-)

Play and Enjoy! Also you aren't lazy to write about your impressions and remarks :-)

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator included in original archive and available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/8716).

Credits and Gratitudes:
   white_pony (for good balanced and one of the oldest custom map for CS:S).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

What does the worm got on a hook think of fishing..? :D
